notes: [Improved] Updated access to `actionSubscribe` and `actionUnsubscribe` controller methods to allowAnonymous
[Improved] Updated SproutLists_SubscriptionModel email attribute to use `AttributeType::Email`
[Improved] Updated getListCount and getSubscriberCount on variable class to better support third party integrations
[Improved] Removed MailChimp integration (Moved to Sprout Mailchimp plugin)
[Fixed] Fixed bug where listHandle was required for third-party integrations
[Fixed] Fixed bug when retrieving all lists with SproutLists_SubscriberListType::getLists
